title: Driver Genius 12.0.0.1211 Final and Crack
description:
Just like your Windows operating system needs updates occasionally, your devices need software updates too. Nothing is more frustrating than having a computer that won't talk to its printer, mouse, sound card or other device, but when one of your devices suddenly stops responding, it's usually an indicator that you have an issue with your device driver.

The trouble is that determining which device needs an update, what update to give it and where to find that update can be difficult and time consuming tasks.

That's when you need Driver Genius!







Installation Instructions.

1. First install the software.

2. Then run the program and update the database with live updater first. (This will usually be        done automatically while installing. If it doesn't happen then do it manually)

3. Now copy the cracked file and replace with original DriverGenius.exe.

4. You can now update all your out of date drivers.

Note:-

Never update the software.
